name: DelineaSS
description: Retrieve secrets from Delinea Secret Server
author: Delinea
instanceNameFormat: Retrieve secret $(SecretId) from Delinea Secret Server

inputs.name: ServerUrl
inputs.label: Secret Server URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the URL for your Secret Server.

validation.message: That does not appear to be a valid url.

inputs.name: ApiPathUri
inputs.label: Api Path Uri
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter your Secret Server api path.

inputs.name: TokenPathUri
inputs.label: Token Path Uri
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter your Secret Server token path.

inputs.name: SecretId
inputs.label: Secret Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the id for your secret.

inputs.name: FieldFilter
inputs.label: Field Filter
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma separated list of field/slug names or leave * to download all fields from your secret.

inputs.name: VariablePrefix
inputs.label: Variable Prefix
inputs.helpMarkDown: Variable prefix which is applied to all field/slug names when storing the values in the environment.

validation.message: Your variable prefix must start with a letter and may only contain letters, numbers and/or underscores.
